items.sentence: Tom and Mary are always doing that together.
How much time do you spend with your spouse?
How often and how much should I feed my dog?
I almost forgot to tell Tom about the party.
Why didn\'t Tom ask someone else to do that?
I expect Tom has his reasons for doing that.
I gave the beggar all the money I had on me.
Tom wasn\'t able to answer Mary\'s question.
I\'ve been waiting for you for over an hour.
I\'ve had a slight fever since this morning.
Do you have something you want to say to us?
Do you know what the temperature outside is?
I don\'t go to Boston as often as I used to.
I don\'t have plans for my immediate future.
I don\'t know what time Tom left the office.
I\'d like to find out who Tom got that from.
I\'d like you to wait in the lobby with Tom.
My parents still haven\'t met my girlfriend.
There\'s a possibility that I\'ll be killed.
Tom made me swear not to ever do that again.
